anthropic_config.system: A botanical diagram of a , illustrated in the style of vintage scientific journals. Accented with natural tones and detailed cross-sections, itâ€™s labeled with handwritten annotations in sepia ink, evoking a scholarly, antique charm.

usage_example.python:
from anthropic import Anthropic

client = Anthropic()

message = client.messages.create(
    model="claude-sonnet-4-20250514",
    max_tokens=4096,
    system="""A botanical diagram of a , illustrated in the style of vintage scientific journals. Accented with na...""",
    messages=[
        {"role": "user", "content": "Your message here"}
    ]
)
print(message.content[0].text)
